note: Feasibility review updated for v3.0 (deep platform rework). All findings remain unchanged -- the rework affects forms and platform constraints, not feasibility of individual findings. All 9 feasible findings are implementable on ordinary forms (1C:UT 10.2). Ordinary forms require programmatic element creation (ПриОткрытии), modal dialogs instead of notifications, buttons instead of commands, but do not change the feasibility of data-layer and server-side logic.
